alfredsnippet.snippet:
x = ['Product A', 'Product B', 'Product C']
y = [20, 14, 23]
y2 = [16,12,27]

trace1 = go.Bar(
    x=x,
    y=y,
    text=y,
    textposition = 'auto',
    marker=dict(
        color='rgb(158,202,225)',
        line=dict(
            color='rgb(8,48,107)',
            width=1.5),
        ),
    opacity=0.6
)

trace2 = go.Bar(
    x=x,
    y=y2,
    text=y2,
    textposition = 'auto',
    marker=dict(
        color='rgb(58,200,225)',
        line=dict(
            color='rgb(8,48,107)',
            width=1.5),
        ),
    opacity=0.6
)

data = [trace1,trace2]

iplot(data, filename='grouped-bar-direct-labels')
alfredsnippet.name: plot plotly barplot labels multiple
